bibl.title: Dioscorus and the law
Learned Antiquity – Scholarship and society in the Near-East, the Greco-Roman world, and the Early Medieval West
bibl.author: VAN MINNEN, Peter

bibl.note: Traite des rescrits d'Aphrodité. - Pp. 131-132: Appendix 1: Translations of the most important texts referred to above [P. Cairo Masp. I, 67024-67028]; - 133: Appendix 2: Revised stemma of Dioscorus's immediate family.
VAN MINNEN Peter, Dioscorus and the Law.

Alasdair A. MacDONALD, Michael W. TWOMEY and Gerrit Jan REININK (Edd.), Learned Antiquity. Scholarship and Society in the Near-East, the Greco-Roman World, and the Early Medieval West = Groningen Studies in Cultural Change. 5 (Leuven, 2003) pp. 115-133, 1 arbre généal.
